revised_title: Revisiting Archimedes' Burning Fleet: A Review of Father Kircher's Experiments
tldr: This article discusses the historical debate surrounding Archimedes' alleged ability to set fire to enemy ships using mirrors. The author, James Parsons, reviews Father Kircher's experiments and findings, which aimed to prove the feasibility of this claim. Kircher's experiments involved using multiple plane mirrors to focus sunlight onto a single point, and his work was later supported by other scientists like Buffon. The article highlights the importance of considering historical accounts and scientific experiments in understanding the capabilities of ancient inventors like Archimedes.
